programme.desc: Pansexual Sarah can't wait to road test her new body on her first date as a woman. Plumber Jamie's love life has gone down the u-bend, so he's all cisterns go to find a partner.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Big Baby Ball: When Coach Mellor singles out Adam during dodgeball, Beverly intervenes and gets him fired. But then Murray and Adam see Mellor in a new light.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: A Goldberg Thanksgiving: Beverly challenges Erica to participate in Jazzercise after Erica says her mum's obsession is sad. Marvin visits the family at Thanksgiving.

programme.title: Don't Tell the Bride
programme.desc: Sonny is a party fanatic. How will his bride Jazmin greet his plans for a zoo-themed Ibizan beach party wedding with everyone covered in animal-print body paint?

programme.title: Lego Masters Australia
programme.desc: City in the Sky: Previous winners and finalists return for a Grand Masters special series. First up, they must create a world suspended high in the sky.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Da Mimmo: Gordon tries to transform New Jersey Italian restaurant Da Mimmo, which is run by a mother and her three sons - two of whom see the business as a failure...

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Juicy Box: Gordon helps a Haitian juice bar and restaurant in Brooklyn. Jacques opened the Juicy Box to provide healthier options for the neighbourhood, but it's fallen into chaos.

programme.title: Playing with Fire
programme.desc: (2019) Fun-filled family comedy starring John Cena. A macho fireman has to babysit three impish kids after saving them from a blaze in the remote California woodlands.

programme.title: Secret Headquarters
programme.desc: (2022) Family comedy with Michael Pea. A young lad discovers that his slacker dad is a superhero. And before he's got used to the idea, he must foil a villain's plot to bring his dad down.

programme.title: The Great New Year Bake Off
programme.desc: As the oven timers strike midnight, teams of legendary bakers from seasons gone by bring in 2026 the only way they know how... with fabulous festive baking and plenty of merry making.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: You Only Move Twice: Homer is offered a new job by mysterious businessman Hank Scorpio. But will Marge, Bart and Lisa be happy in their idyllic new home town?

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Hurricane Neddy: The Flanders' home is blown down by a hurricane and the Leftorium is looted. Homer leads the rebuilding project, but will Ned be happy with his new house?

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Springfield Files: Homer thinks he's seen an alien in the woods. This could be a case for Mulder and Scully (guest stars David Duchovny and Gillian Anderson).

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: (2019) Guy Ritchie's vigorously lamp-rubbing musical remake of the Disney classic, starring Will Smith as the genie. Can urchin Aladdin raise himself up and capture the princess's heart?

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer's Phobia: Homer's prejudices surface when Bart befriends a gay shop owner (guest star John Waters). So he decides to take Bart hunting - but it doesn't go to plan.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer vs the Eighteenth Amendment: When alcohol is banned in Springfield, Moe's Tavern becomes a speakeasy and Homer re-invents himself as the Beer Baron.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Canine Mutiny: Bart buys Laddie, an amazing new dog, with a credit card that's accidentally been sent to Santa's Little Helper.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Old Man and the Lisa: Mr Burns loses all his money and employs Lisa to help him earn back his fortune. But they don't see eye to eye over ethical issues.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer and Apu: When Apu loses the Kwik-E-Mart, he moves in with the Simpsons. And then Homer joins him on a pilgrimage to the first ever Kwik-E-Mart, in the Himalayas.

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: Some of Britain's favourite personalities hit the sofa and tune in for The 1% Club, Spy in the Ocean, Fake Profile, The Yorkshire Vet and lots more great TV.

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The top TV includes: Strictly Come Dancing, Celebrity SAS: Who Dares Wins, A Very Royal Scandal, The Yorkshire Vet, This Morning (gurning) and My Mum, Your Dad.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: (2014) Thriller. Denzel Washington stars as an ex-soldier who comes out of retirement to help a teenage sex worker who's been assaulted by her pimp.

programme.title: Withnail and I
programme.desc: (1987) Richard E Grant and Paul McGann star in Bruce Robinson's cult comedy as hard-drinking, substance-abusing unemployed actors who flee to Cumbria to escape their squalid London life.

programme.title: Walking and Talking
programme.desc: (1996) Comedy with Catherine Keener and Anne Heche. A successful woman's best friend is getting married - making her feel unlucky in love. But is everything as rosy as it at first seems?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Lady Eve
programme.desc: (1941) Screwball romcom with Barbara Stanwyck and Henry Fonda. A con artist is forced to change tack when she falls for her mark and he dumps her for trying to con him in the first place.

programme.title: The Straight Story
programme.desc: (1999) David Lynch's fact-based drama with Richard Farnsworth. Alvin Straight drives hundreds of miles across the USA on a lawnmower to visit his dying brother - Harry Dean Stanton.

programme.title: The Golden Voyage of Sinbad
programme.desc: (1973) Can Sinbad stop a master magician from reaching the Fountain of Destiny on the lost land of Lemuria and being crowned the new leader of Marabia?

programme.title: Stormbreaker
programme.desc: (2006) Family action-thriller with Alex Pettyfer and Mickey Rourke. British intelligence recruit a schoolboy to take on the man who killed his dad and is planning to unleash a deadly virus.

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: (2008) Remake of the sci-fi classic with Keanu Reeves. An alien visits Earth to tell humankind to stop destroying the planet. But when he's attacked, he decides to eradicate us instead...

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead...
programme.desc: ...Reckoning: (2023) Tom Cruise returns as Ethan Hunt and jumps a motorbike off a mountain for real. There's some stuff about an all-powerful AI. But it's the thrills that we're here for!

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: (2011) Naughty kids are one thing but a naughty teacher? Can titular educator Cameron Diaz win a big-bucks teaching competition... and buy surgical enhancements to seduce Justin Timberlake?

programme.title: Late Night with the Devil
programme.desc: (2023) Unsettling found-footage horror with David Dastmalchian. A has-been host tries to save his 70s talk show using a demonically possessed 13-year-old girl. Really, what could go wrong?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: It Came from Outer Space
programme.desc: (1953) Richard Carlson stars as an astronomer who sees an alien craft land. But nobody believes him - until the cloning starts in Jack Arnold's science-fiction classic.

programme.title: Fantastic Voyage
programme.desc: (1966) Classic sci-fi adventure. Raquel Welch and Donald Pleasence are among the crew of a miniaturised submarine that's injected into an injured diplomat's body in a bid to save his life.

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny
programme.desc: (1954) Oscar-nominated Humphrey Bogart, in one of his finest roles, stars in Edward Dmytryk's gripping drama as Captain Philip Queeg, in charge of a US Navy minesweeper during the war.

programme.title: The Frogmen
programme.desc: (1951) Second World War thriller. Richard Widmark, Dana Andrews and Robert Wagner star as divers with a special underwater demolition team taking the war to the Japanese in the Pacific.

programme.title: Jerry & Marge Go Large
programme.desc: (2022) Fact-based comedy starring Bryan Cranston and Annette Bening as a retired couple who find a way to exploit a lottery loophole. But then some rich kids try to muscle in...

programme.title: LA Confidential
programme.desc: (1997) Curtis Hanson's thriller of cops and corruption set in 1950s LA - with Kevin Spacey, Guy Pearce, Russell Crowe and Kim Basinger. Based on James Ellroy's detective novel.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
programme.desc: (2019) Quentin Tarantino's darkly comic drama set in 60s LA, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Brad Pitt and Margot Robbie. A failing actor's world collides with the Manson Family.

programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: (1995) Charming family comedy-drama about a clever little pig who forms a close bond with a farmer and discovers a talent for herding sheep. With James Cromwell.

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: (1998) Charming family comedy sequel. The farm's in trouble and only a sheep-herding pig can save the day. But after a customs mix-up, Babe ends up in a boarding house for lost animals...

programme.title: My Spy
programme.desc: (2020) Family action comedy. A CIA agent (Dave Bautista) gets the run-around from a nine-year-old girl when he's sent to keep an eye on her family. With Chloe Coleman.

programme.title: Pretty Woman
programme.desc: Romantic comedy film starring Richard Gere and Julia Roberts, 1990. A wealthy businessman who hires an escort to join him at social events ends up falling in love with her.

programme.title: The Assembly: Unseen
programme.desc: This episode features unseen questions from The Assembly's grillings of David Tennant, Gary Lineker, Danny Dyer and Jade alongside more revelations from the interviewed stars.

programme.title: ITV News Inc New Year Bongs
programme.desc: ITV News provides a fresh perspective on the major stories of the day with national and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents.

programme.title: It'll Be Alright on the Night
programme.desc: Tom Allen celebrates funny cock-ups from the world of entertainment featuring Idris Elba, Paul Rudd, Ant and Dec, Susanna Reid, Alan Carr and many more of our favourite stars.

programme.title: Westlife 25: Live at the Royal Albert Hall
programme.desc: Join Westlife at London's iconic Royal Albert Hall for a spectacular night of celebration as they mark an extraordinary 25 years at the top of British pop.

programme.title: The Big Quiz: Coronation Street vs Emmerdale
programme.desc: Stephen Mulhern returns to host the ultimate soap showdown as two of ITV's biggest soaps go head-to-head to prove who knows their show best.

programme.title: Gallagher PREM Unleashed
programme.desc: Action from the eighth round of fixtures of the 2025-26 Gallagher PREM Rugby season featuring Sale v Harlequins, Bristol v Newcastle, Bath v Northampton and Exeter v Leicester.

programme.title: TikTok: Top 100 2024
programme.desc: Celebrate 2024's top 100 viral TikTok clips in this epic countdown packed with hilarious, shocking, and spectacular moments alongside a look at how much money these clips earned.

programme.title: Ant and Dec's Limitless Win Christmas Special
programme.desc: Ant and Dec spread the Christmas joy by surprising two audience members with the chance to take on the Limitless Ladder alongside celebrity teammates.

programme.title: Unwind with ITV
programme.desc: Your daily escape designed to calm the mind and encourage relaxation and reflection.

programme.title: The Chase: The Bloopers
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh presents the 2025 bloopers reel - The Governess, The Sinnerman, The Beast, The Vixen, The Dark Destroyer and The Menace might be clever, but they still make mistakes.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Animated adventure comedy film sequel featuring the voices of Mike Myers and Cameron Diaz, 2004. Newlyweds Shrek and Princess Fiona head to Far Far Away to meet her parents.

programme.title: New: Love Your New Year's Day with Alan Titchmarsh
programme.desc: Joining Alan to celebrate New Year's Day 2026 are Bonnie Langford and Gregor Fisher, survivalist Ray Mears and Joe Sugg, and the top five dogs of 2025.

programme.title: New: James Martin's New Year's Day
programme.desc: James celebrates the dawn of 2026 at his Hampshire home with chefs Sally Abe and John Hooker alongside former England rugby player and Strictly Come Dancing star Chris Robshaw.

programme.title: New: Joe Wicks' New Year's Day
programme.desc: Joe Wicks kicks off 2026 with a high-energy New Year's Day special featuring workouts, great food, and uplifting chats with Olly Murs, Nisha Katona, Tilly Ramsay and more.

programme.title: ITV Lunchtime News
programme.desc: The latest headlines from around the world at lunchtime with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents, all of which are followed by a national weather forecast.

programme.title: ITV Racing: Live from Cheltenham
programme.desc: Ed Chamberlin presents racing from Cheltenham, Musselburgh and Windsor - the feature meeting is at Cheltenham where the Relkeel Hurdle is one of the feature races.

programme.title: ITV Evening News
programme.desc: National and international news with reports and analysis from ITV's Correspondents in the UK and around the world, plus a focus on the stories that matter to you.

programme.title: New: Tipping Point: Lucky Stars
programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts as journalist Lucrezia Millarini, actor Danny Miller, and tenor Russell Watson put their wits to the test in the hope of winning 20,000 pounds for charity.

programme.title: New: The Chase
programme.desc: Bradley Walsh hosts as Bean from Teddington, Jack from Morpeth, Pam from Edinburgh and Peter from Bolton take on one of the country's finest quiz brains and try to strike it rich.

programme.title: New: Time is Money
programme.desc: Sara Davies hosts the quick-fire quiz where contestants are given their prize money upfront but must race to keep hold of it while coping with pressure.

programme.title: Emmerdale
programme.desc: There is a sinister start to the new year as a happy surprise has danger looming, and Ray hopes that his dream can come true.

programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Becky resorts to extreme measures to finally achieve her goal, Todd flees after Theo unleashes his temper, and Debbie's friends surprise her with a pre-wedding pamper party.

programme.title: New: Red Eye
programme.desc: Thrilling drama. As the murder of a diplomatic courier leads DS Hana Li to London's US Embassy, MI5's Madeline Delaney receives a call about a bomb on the jet she is travelling on.

programme.title: ITV News at Ten
